name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in architecting high-performance solutions utilizing **Python**, **FastAPI**, **TypeScript**, **Vue.js**, **React**, and SQL databases such as **PostgreSQL**. My comprehensive background in full-stack development allows me to create scalable applications that meet complex business needs while guiding teams in best practices through mentoring.
I have a proven track record in building enterprise-grade platforms, with a focus on integrating LLM APIs and implementing effective prompt engineering strategies. My expertise includes developing and deploying applications that adhere to industry compliance standards, leveraging a robust microservices architecture and event-driven systems. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience in cloud environments such as Azure and AWS, ensuring seamless remote collaboration and robust CI/CD automation. I also contribute to machine learning initiatives by designing machine learning pipelines and utilizing MLOps tools effectively.
